roleset.name: to show to be false

example.name: transitive
example.text: CBS pursues top sports `` to belie the fact that they are n't supporting affiliates , viewers and advertisers , '' charges Thomas H. Wyman , who was ousted as chairman of CBS Inc. after Laurence A. Tisch bought a 24.9 % stake in the company and took over three years ago .

propbank.arg: the fact that they are n't supporting affiliates , viewers and advertisers

roleset.note: BELIE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'belie' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from belie.01-v predicate notes)
